name: Lounge-assistant
body:
## Welcome to Lounge Assistant.
Lounge Assistant is a [GreaseMonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/) script that
improves the look and the functionality of [csgolounge](http://csgolounge.com)

It's deeply inspired by [Lounge Companion](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lounge-companion-dota-2-c/pokidbfaabncipciiigfhncfmgmdjdaj?hl=en). And it tries to mimic the comportment.

It's compatible with Chrome and Firefox.

![](http://i.imgur.com/3t0uB4t.png)
## Installation
### Firefox
1. Install [GreaseMonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/)
2. Click on this [Link] (https://github.com/LoungeAssistant/Lounge-Assistant/raw/master/Lounge_Assistant.user.js)
3. Click on the install button
4. ???
5. Profit !

#### Chrome

1. Install [TamperMonkey] (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo?hl=en)
2. Click on this [Link] (https://github.com/LoungeAssistant/Lounge-Assistant/raw/master/Lounge_Assistant.user.js)
3. Click on the install button
4. ???
5. Profit !

Everything is ready to go, you just need to go on [csgolounge](http://csgolounge.com)
## Functionality

* Fancy design
* Display item price on hover
* Display item quality 
* Enhanced Item Preview
* Auto update 


## It's open source !

Everything is open source, so feel free to contribute on github on this [repository](https://github.com/LoungeAssistant/Lounge-Assistant)

## Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? contact me at loungeassistant@bi.tk and â€™ll help you sort it out.
